Every 20 seconds, gain one of three random effect for 5 (10) seconds:30% chance to get +30% evasion 30% chance to get +20% critical chance and +50% critical damage 40% chance to get +20% damage taken.
When own Health falls below 20%, recovers 15% (25%) of max Health and increases own Reload by 30% until the end of the battle. Can only occur once per battle.
Every 20 seconds during battle, reduces main fleet ignition damage by 30% (60%) for 8 seconds.
When Fumirul launches an airstrike, 30% (60%) chance to heal the ship with the lowest HP for 2% (10%) of her max Health.
Reduces damage received by all Ironblood ships in the fleet by 5% (15%).
When firing main gun, 5% chance to increase own Evasion by 30% (60%) for 8 seconds.
After battle begins, recovers HP of entire fleet equal to 1% (3.5%) of Little Bel's max HP.
Every 35 seconds, recovers HP of entire fleet equal to 1% (3%) of Akashi's max HP.
If Tanikaze is the only alive ship left of the Escort Fleet, increases own Evasion by 4% (10%) and reduce damage taken from airstrike by 30% (50%).
Every 20 seconds: 30% (70%) chance to increase own Evasion by 10% (20%) and Accuracy by 20% (50%) for 12 seconds.
While alive in fleet, reduces damage received by main fleet by 3.5% (8%). Additionally, reduces Light Cruisers' and Destroyers' gun and torpedo damage dealt to Hatakaze by 1% (10%).

When firing Anti-Air guns: 30% chance to increase own Anti-Air stat by 5% (25%) for 5 seconds. Once per battle, if sortied with Li'l Sandy or Clevelad, and their Health falls under 40%: increases own Firepower and Accuracy by 5% (25%) for 15 seconds.

SKILLNAME: Night of the Iron Bottom Sound
DESCRIPTION: When Health of South Dakota falls under 30%: increases own damage dealt by 5% (20%) and absorbs 30% damage taken by South Dakota(damage taken through South Dakota's skill 'The Strongest Shield' will NOT be transferred). South Dakota also avoids all lethal damage for 5 seconds. Can only occur once per battle.

When an enemy aircraft is shot down within the fleet's AA range: increases own Firepower and Anti-Air by 5% (15%) for 8 seconds. If fleet has shot down 15 or more enemy aircraft during the battle: increases own Firepower by 5% (15%) and Reload by 10% (20%) for the rest of the battle.
When taking damage: Escort Fleet has 15% chance to evade all incoming attacks for 5 (10) seconds (Has a 20 second cooldown. Skill starts on cooldown.)
Every 30 seconds, spawns 2 rotating shields for 5 (15) seconds that block up to 8 shots. When broken, explodes and deals a small amount of damage to nearby enemies.
When Health falls below 50%: increases own Evasion by 15% (30%) and recovers 2% of max HP every 2 seconds for 8 seconds. Can only activate twice per battle.
Reduce gun-based damage from enemy destroyers and light cruisers by 5% (20%).
Every 10 seconds, 5% (25%) chance to heal Rurutie for 2% of her max Health. The skill can be activated for maximum 6 times each battle.
Decreases damage Vanguard Fleet takes when colliding with an enemy ship by 15% (30%).
When Health falls under 20%, heal 15% (25%) of max Health. Can only occur once per battle.
Begins each Sortie with 1 (3) Emergency Repair.
When an allied ship's HP falls to 0: 30.0% (60.0%) chance to heal self by 3.5% (8.0%) of own max HP and other allied ships' HP by 1.2% (3.0%) of their max HP.

While alive in fleet, increases Speed of all ships in Escort Fleet by 3, and reduces damage taken from ramming by 15% (25%). Once per battle, when taking damage while own Health is below 30%: evades all incoming attack for 2 (5) seconds, and increases own damage dealt by 5% (15%) for the rest of the battle.
Reduces High Explosive damage by 5% (20%) (only applies to self) and reduces Aviation damage received by 5% (20%) (only applies to self).
When firing main gun, 5% chance to increase own Evasion by 30% (60%) for 8 seconds.
All allied ships with lower health than Sheffield at the start of battle gain the effect: When taking damage, 10.0% (30.0%) chance to receive 20.0% (50.0%) less damage.

After battle begins, and 15% (30%) chance to activate every 15 seconds after that: deploys a smokescreen for 5 seconds. Escort ships within the smokescreen have 20% (40%) additional Evasion Rate, does not stack with same skill effect.
SHIPNAMES: Juno, Leander (Retrofit), Crescent (Retrofit), Acasta, Comet (Retrofit), Bailey, Southampton, Sims (Retrofit), Cygnet (Retrofit)

DESCRIPTION: 10 seconds after battle begins, and 20% chance to activate every 20 seconds after that: deploys a smokescreen for 10 seconds. Escort ships within the smokescreen have their Evasion Rate increased by 15% (35%) and take 15% (35%) less damage from airstrikes. Does not stack with same skill effect.
Increase the probability of being set on fire by 6% max (exact value depends on enemy's gun caliber) and increases duration of any fires by 3 seconds. Reduces AP damage taken by self by 15% (30%).
When resurfacing: stays on the surface for 4.5 (12) more seconds.
When firing main gun, 5% chance to increase own Evasion stat by 16% (40%) and decrease air damage taken by 16% (40%) for 8 seconds.
Increases own Speed by 3 (8) and increase own Evasion by 13% (25%).
Every 30 seconds, absorbs 50% of damage taken by the Main Fleet for 8 seconds. At the end of the effect, heals for 20% (50%) of the damage taken.
When taking damage, 5% (25%) chance to decrease said damage to 1. At the start of battle, increases own Luck stat by 5.
Every 20 seconds: 40% (70%) chance to spawn 3 rotating shields that absorb 10 shots each; lasts 10 seconds.
If placed in leftmost position, reduces damage taken by self by 4.5% (12%). During battle, reduces shelling damage taken by Lena and Li'l Sandy by 3.5% (8%).
Every 35 (25) seconds, launches 3 torpedoes and heals for 20% of the damage inflicted.
Upon taking damage: launches a SBD Dauntless squadron (damage is based on skill level); has a cooldown of 20 seconds. Once per battle, when Health falls below 20%: recovers 15% (25%) of max Health.
When firing main gun, 4% chance to increase own Evasion by 20% (50%) for 8 seconds.
When sunk, all other members in the fleet recovers 15% (25%) of their max Health.

100 seconds after start of a battle, increase Escort fleet's Evasion by 3.5% (8%) and recover all escort fleet members HP by 4.5% (12%) of Nekone's total HP. The skill can only be activated once per battle.
When launching torpedoes, 20% (40%) chance to evade all attacks for 5 seconds.
When firing main gun, 4% chance to increase Fleet's movement speed, and Escort Fleet's Evasion by 20% (40%) for 8 seconds.

If equipped with a CL Main Gun in own Secondary Weapon slot: increases Anti-Air Gun Efficiency by 5% (15%). If equipped with an Anti-Air Gun in own Secondary Weapon slot: increases Main Gun Efficiency by 5% (15%). If placed in the rightmost position in the Escort Fleet: decreases damage taken by self by 5% (15%).
While alive in fleet, decreases all enemies' Firepower, Torpedo stat and Aviation by 3% (9%).
While alive in fleet, reduces incoming aviation damage taken by the Main Fleet by 5% (15%).
While alive in fleet, increases airstrike damage dealt by all CVs/CVLs by 5% (15%). Does not stacks with same skill.
When launching an airstrike: increase Air Power by 5% (15%), and Firepower by 4% (10%) for all ships in the Main Fleet for 8 seconds.
After every airstrike, increase the air power of other CV/Ls by 5% (15%) for 8 seconds
Increase Firepower, Reload and Accuracy by 4.5% (12%) for all North Union and Eastern Radiance ships in Escort fleet.
During sortie, increases Accuracy, Firepower by 10% (25%) and Evasion by 4% (10%) for all An Shan-class ships (An Shan, Fu Shun, Chang Chun, and Tai Yuan).
Increase Anti-Air of cruisers in the same fleet by 5% (15%). Does not stack with other command skills that have similar effect.
Increase Anti-Air for Main Fleet by 5% (15%). Does not stack with other command skills that have similar effect.
Increase Anti-Air of vanguards in the same fleet by 5% (15%). Does not stack with other command skills that have similar effect.
Every time Illustrious launches an airstrike, applies a shield around ships in the Escort Fleet for 8s equal to 5% (10%) of Illustrious's HP
Increases Firepower of Cruisers in the same fleet by 5% (15%). Does not stack with other command skills that have similar effect.
Increases Firepower of Destroyers in the same fleet by 5% (15%). Does not stack with other command skills that have similar effect.
Increases Firepower of the Main Fleet by 5% (15%). Does not stack with other command skills that have similar effect.
Increases Firepower of the Escort Fleet by 5% (15%). Does not stack with other command skills that have similar effect.
Increases experience gained by Carriers by 5% (15%)
When sortieing as Lead Ship, decreases own Anti-Air by 40% and Accuracy by 20% (5%) while increasing own Evasion by 6% (12%), Firepower by 13% (25%) and Speed by 3.
When sortied as the Escort Fleet Leader (First Slot) and paired with 33, increase Firepower, Reload by 10% (30%) and Evasion by 15% (35%) for both 22 and 33.
When sortied as the Escort Fleet Leader (First Slot) and paired with 22, increase Torpedo stat by 15% (35%) for both 22 and 33.
When in the same fleet with Ning Hai and/or Ping Hai, reduces their damage and own damage taken by 8% (20%) and increases their Evasion Rate and own Evasion Rate by 15% (30%).

SKILLNAME: Cannon Fire That Marked A Change of Era
DESCRIPTION: Increases damage dealt by all Escort ships by 15% (35%).

During battle, increases own Air Power and Anti-Air by 1.5% (5%) per Eagle Union CV/CVL in the fleet. When own aircraft shoots down an enemy aircraft, increases own Air Power by 1% (3%) (Effect can be stacked up to 5 times).
When entering battle: launches a Saiun plane, then increases damage dealt by the Main Fleet by 5% (10%) for 10 seconds.
Every 30 seconds, reduces damage dealt by enemies by 5% (15%) for 8 seconds.

While alive in the fleet, decreases damage taken by allied CVs/CVLs by 5% (10%). When sortieing with Gridley, increases own Firepower by 5% (15%) and increases Gridley's Firepower and Reload by 5% (15%).

At the start of the battle: increases own Firepower by 1.5% (6%) per Kizuna AI ships other than self (can be stacked up to 4 times). If there are no other Kizuna AIs in your fleet: decreases damage taken by 5% (15%) for 30 seconds after battle starts.
Every 15 seconds switch between following effects:Reduces damage taken by 6% (20%) Increases damage dealt by 6% (20%) Every 3 seconds restore 6 (15) HP
When sortie with other J-Class destroyers in same fleet, reduce damage taken by other J-Class destroyers by 8% (20%), and take 8% (20%) more damage.
While alive in fleet, decreases the Evasion Rate of all enemy Destroyers and Light Cruisers by 10% (20%).
Every 20 seconds: 25% chance to reduce damage taken by all ships in the fleet by 5% (15%) for 8 seconds. Does not stack with the same skill.
During sortie, if escort fleet is compose of Emile Bertin and destroyers only, increases own Speed by 4 and increases own damage against destroyers and cruisers by 5% (20%).
Every 20 seconds: 25% chance to reduce a random enemy's Reload and damage for 5 (10)s. Effect prioritizes elite (human-form) enemies. Does not stack with the same skill.
When firing main gun, 50% chance to heal the Escort Fleet for 4% (10%) of their max Health.
At the beginning of battle, increase own Firepower and Torpedo stat by 9% (24%). Every 12 seconds after, decrease own Firepower and Torpedo stat by 3% (8%), which can be stacked 3 times.

Use a random piece of prototype equipment with various effects every 12 seconds:17% - Prototype Cannon: Fires an HE ammo barrage. 17% - Prototype Torpedoes: Fires a torpedo barrage. 14% - Yuubari Firework: Fires a normal ammo barrage. 14% - Spawns a shield that can block 60 hits and lasts for 18 seconds. 14% - Spawns a shield that can block 99 hits and lasts for 6 seconds. 14% - Heals all ships in the fleet for 2.4% of their max HP. 10% - Bandaids - Heals all ships in the fleet for 9 HP.
After combat, increases experience gained by all Cruisers by 5% (15%).
Increases Oxygen by 4 (40).
Reduces damage taken by Flagship by 15% (25%).

10 seconds after battle begins, and 20% (40%) chance to activate every 20 seconds after that: deploys a flare for 10 seconds. Enemy ships within the flare have their Evasion decreased by 25%. Flare will prioritize closest enemy target.
Every time Lexington launches an airstrike, increases Escort Fleet damage by 5% (15%) for 8 seconds. Does not stack with the same skill.
Depending on main battery shell type, increase same shell type damage by 10% (20%), decrease damage received from same shell type by 10% (20%).
While alive in fleet, increases Firepower, Accuracy by 5% (15%) and Evasion by 5% (20%) for all Kongou-class ships.

SKILLNAME: Glory of the Sun Which Never Sets
DESCRIPTION: Increase own damage dealt to Sakura Empire, Ironblood, Sardinia and Siren factions by 4% (10%). When the fleet has 3 or more other ships from the Royal Navy, increase firepower, reload, evasion and anti-air by 4% (20%).
If sortied with Zuikaku, increases own Air Power by 12% (30%) and damage taken by self by 5%.
If sortied with Shoukaku, increase own Air Power by 8% (20%) and reduce damage taken by self by 8% (20%).
When sortied with any Cleveland-class ship, increases own Anti-Air by 5% (15%) and Accuracy by 5% (10%).
When firing Anti-Air Guns, 15% chance to increase fleet's Anti-Air by 30% (50%) for 8 seconds.
When paired with Kaga or Kaga (Battleship) in the same fleet, increases own Air Power by 15% (35%).
During sortie, increases Firepower, Torpedo stat and Accuracy of Iris Libre (FFNF) and Vichya Dominion (MNF) destroyers by 5% (15%).
During battle, increases own Air Power, Anti-Air, and Reload by 1% (5%) per allied Ironblood ship in the fleet.
Increase critical chance of cannons, torpedoes and aircraft by 4% (20%), reload by 4.5% (12%) for Ironblood ships. Increase damage dealt by Tirpitz by 20% (40%)
Decreases equipped Main Gun Spread by 3. Increases own damage dealt to Heavy Cruisers, Large Cruisers, Battlecruisers, Battleships, and Aviation Battleships by 10% (20%).

Main Gun damage is not affected by enemy's armor type; Main Gun always inflict 100% (115%) damage to all enemies. If equipped with an IJN (Sakura Empire) DD Gun: increases Main Gun efficiency by 5% (15%).

Every 20 seconds: performs super A.I. hacking to decrease all enemies' Firepower, Torpedo stat, and Air Power by a large amount (up to 4.0% (8.0%)) for 8 seconds... Also has a small chance to accidentally increase the stats of all enemies instead.

When launching an airstrike: launch an additional Lv.1 (Lv.10) TBF Avenger squadron. If sortied with any Cleveland-class cruisers (Cleveland, Clevelad, Columbia, Denver, Montpelier), increase their Firepower by 3.5% (8.0%), increase own Air Power and Accuracy by 5% (15%), and enhance TBF Avenger squadron barrage pattern.
Every 20 seconds: 30% (60%) chance to increase Firepower and Accuracy for all cruisers in the fleet by 5% (25%) and decrease damage taken by them by 5% (15%) for 8 seconds.
Increases own Firepower by 4% (10%). Every 20 seconds, 30% (60%) chance to increase all Cruisers' Firepower and Torpedo stat by 5% (20%) for 10 seconds.
Every 20 seconds, 30% (60%) chance to reduce Firepower, Torpedo stat, and Aviation of enemy ships by 4.5% (12%) for 10 seconds.
15 seconds after battle begins, increases Firepower, Reload and Evasion for all ships in the fleet by 1.5% (6%) for 20 seconds.

When entering the map, if U-47 is the sole unit of the submarine fleet: increases damage dealt to Battleships (Battlecruisers and Aviation Battleships are not counted) by 5% (20%), increases Search Level by 1 and increases Ammo by 2.
During sortie, increases damage dealt to cruisers by all allied IJN (Sakura Empire) Destroyers by 5% (15%).

If a Neptunia ship is present in the fleet, increase own damage by 3% (10%) and decrease damage received by 6%. Also increases own damage by 1% (2%), and decreases damage received by 1% for each Neptunia ship, excluding herself.
When sortied with New Orleans-class ships, increase Accuracy and Anti-Air by 5% (20%) and Firepower by 4% (10%) for all New Orleans-class cruisers (Astoria, Minneapolis, Quincy and Vincennes).
When paired with Souryuu in the same fleet, increase own Air Power by 15% (35%).

SKILLNAME: Observer of the Sky and Ocean
DESCRIPTION: 10 seconds after battle starts, launches a remote controlled F6F fighter; if the fighter is shot down, launch an aerial barrage (damage increases with level); every 8 seconds after launching the fighter, increase own Accuracy by 1% (3%) and damage dealt by 2.5% (7%), can be stacked 5 times.
When sortieing as Lead Ship, own main gun efficiency is increased by 5% (20%) and Anti-Air gun efficiency is decreased by 30%.
Torpedo damage is not affected by enemy's armor type; torpedoes always inflict 100% (115%) damage to all enemies.

10 seconds after start of battle and 20% chance every 20 seconds after: For 8 seconds, receives 20% (50%) of damage other backline ships take, and increases damage dealt to a random enemy by 8% (20%).
Increases experience gained by Destroyers by 6% (18%).
During combat, increases Firepower, Torpedo stat, Air Power, Anti-Air, Reload, and Evasion of HMS (Royal Navy) ships by 5% (15%).
Every 20 seconds, 30% (60%) chance to increase damage taken by all enemies on the screen by 20% (40%) for 10 seconds.
Every 20 seconds: 25% chance to increase damage dealt by all ships in the fleet by 5% (25%) for 8 seconds. Does not stack with the same skill.
Upon taking damage, 4.5% (12%) chance to reduce damage taken by 50%. When sortied as Flagship: increases Firepower and Reload of all allied Sakura Empire (IJN) ships by 5% (20%).
When entering the battle, increase Escort Fleet's Accuracy by 5% (20%) for 20 seconds.
During own air strike, lowest percent HP vanguard ship will evade all damage for 2 (5) seconds.
Increases Reload of cruisers in the fleet by 5% (15%). Does not stack with other command skills that have similar effect.
Increase Reload of Destroyers in the fleet by 5% (15%). Does not stack with other command skills that have similar effect.
Increases Reload for all CVLs in the fleet by 5% (15%). Does not stack with other command skills that have similar effect.
Increase reload of the Escort Fleet by 5% (15%). Does not stack with other command skills that have similar effect.
Every 20 seconds, 25% chance to increase fleet's Reload by 5% (25%) for 8 seconds. Does not stack with the same skill.
Can be used as material to Limit Break any ship of Elite (SR) quality and below.
Can be used as material to Limit Break any ship of Super Rare (SSR) quality.

When own HP is between:100% and 70% of max HP: increases own Firepower by 10% (20%). 70% and 30% of max HP: increases own Firepower by 4% (10%) and decreases damage taken by self by 4% (10%). 30% and 1% of max HP: decreases damage taken by self by 10% (20%).
When paired with Uruuru, increase own Air Power by 15% (35%), and Reload and Accuracy by 10% (20%).
If in same fleet with Vert/Green Heart, increase own damage dealt by 10% (25%) and damage received by 10% (15%). Otherwise, decrease damage received by 10% (25%) and damage dealt by 10% (15%).
If sortied with Ning Hai, increases own Firepower by 15% (35%).

In combat, increases Firepower and Evasion of Fletcher-class Destroyers (Fletcher, Radford, Jenkins, Nicholas, Foote, Spence, Thatcher, Kimberly, Mullany, Bush, Aulick, Charles Ausburne and Hazelwood) by 10% (30%).
1 second after battle starts, increases own Firepower, Torpedo stat, and ASW stat by 1% (10%), and reduces aviation damage taken by the fleet by 1.5% (6%) for 30 seconds.
While alive in fleet, increases Reload and Torpedo stat for all Light Cruisers and Destroyers in the same fleet by 5% (20%).
After launching an airstrike, heal the Escort Fleet for 3.5% (8%) of their max HP.
When firing main gun: 30% (60%) chance to increase damage dealt by all Battleships/Battlecruisers by 5% (20%) for 8 seconds.
Increases Firepower, Torpedo stat, and Reload of all Cruisers by 1% (10%). Does not stack with other command skills that have similar effect.
Increases Firepower, Torpedo stat, and Reload of Destroyers in the fleet by 1% (10%). Does not stack with other command skills that have similar effect.

Increase own Airpower by 5% (15%). If sortied as flagship, increase allied Eagle Union (USS) Battleships' Firepower by 5% (15%); If sortied as non-flagship, increase allied Eagle Union (USS) Destroyers' Firepower and Anti-Air by 5% (15%).

Decreases damage taken from burning and suicide boat by 20% (40%) and from HE shells by 5% (15%). Increases secondary gun's critical hit chance by 40% (70%) and ignores armor type (damage based on Skill Level).

When sortied as Flagship: increases Firepower by 4% (10%), and Reload and Accuracy by 5% (20%) for allied Sakura Empire ships. Additionally, increases damage dealt by Sakura Empire Aircraft Carriers (does not include Aviation Battleships) by 5% (20%).
In combat, increases Firepower and Reload by 5% (15%), and Torpedo stat by 4% (8%) for all Destroyers from Destroyer Division 8 (Asashio, Ooshio, Michishio and Arashio).
Reduces the Dispersion of equipped main gun by 0.5 (5). Increases own Firepower by 3% (15%) and hit rate against Destroyers by 3% (15%).

Increase Airpower of Aircraft Carriers and Light Aircraft Carriers by 1% (10%) and increase their hit rate against Destroyers, Light Cruisers, Heavy Cruisers by 1% (10%). During battle, for every Aircraft Carrier and Light Aircraft Carrier in the same fleet, buff Sirius' Firepower, Torpedo stat and Reload by 1.5% (7%) each. Only up to 3 ships can count toward this bonus (a 21% buff is the maximum attainable).
In battle, increases Firepower by 15% (30%), Evasion by 15% (30%) and Torpedo by 4% (10%) for all Special Type (Tokugata) Destroyers (Fubuki, Ayanami, Akatsuki, Ikazuchi, and Inazuma) in same fleet.
Increase Torpedo stat of Destroyers in the fleet by 5% (15%). Does not stack with other command skills that have similar effect.
Increases Torpedo stat of all ships in the escort fleet by 5% (15%). Does not stack with other command skills that have similar effect.
While alive in fleet, increases Reload and Torpedo for all Light Cruisers and Destroyers in the same fleet by 3% (15%).
Once per battle, increases damage dealt with the first Main Gun salvo by 20% (50%). Enemies hit by own Main Gun salvoes take 3% (12%) more damage for 8 seconds.
Main gun damage is not affected by armor type (armor modifier is always 100%). Additionally, increase main gun damage by 5% (15%).
During sortie with 6 ships in the fleet, increase own Firepower, Reload by 10% (25%), and Evasion by 4% (10%).

Decreases damage taken to self by 20%. While alive in fleet, increases Torpedo critical hit chance for all Light Cruisers and Destroyers in the same fleet by 4% (10%). Starting from level 6 of the skill, also increases Torpedo critical hit damage by 5% (30%).
If in same fleet with Hamakaze, increase own Firepower, Torpedo stat, Reload, and Anti-Air by 4% (10%).
While alive in fleet, reduce damage received by the backline by 3.5% (8%). Once per battle, when any ship in the backline drops below 20% health, heal said ship for 4% (10%) of their max HP.
During combat, increases Firepower and Evasion of Z-Class ships by 20% (40%).
Upon taking an attack, increases own Reload by 30% (50%) for 8 seconds. Effect does not stack with itself.
